abstract.para: This document contains SDK manual for the OLAS product.

chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: OLAS is an authentication, signature and user data exchange service. It allows 3th party web application to authenticate users, involve users in transactions and obtain user identity data. It brings to users a central identity management.

OLAS offers several services to applications:
Authentication service: if an application calls this service the user is authenticated by OLAS using one of his configured devices. Upon success the application is informed and can grant access to the user.
Attribute service: an application can query the user’s attributes and use their values in its business processes. Attributes can only be read if the user has given explicit permission to do so.
Data service: an application can push attributes to the user’s profile. These attributes could then be used by other applications (if allowed by the user and the providing application).
